alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Martin and southeastern Daviess Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 218 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shoals, or 23 miles northeast of Petersburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Shoals around 225 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
